title: Experimental Design Course for Improving Information-Integrated Categorical Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Categorization Theory and Understanding of Integrated Information Learning Concepts
context.additional_context: Course developing strategic thinking and adaptability through information integration tasks combined with language learning in VR environments

learning_goals: Learners can categorize complex linguistic data using information integration strategies in a VR simulation environment
Learners can maintain or improve optimal categorization strategies when performing the same task with a 24-hour interval
Learners can distinguish between information integration and rule-based strategies in various virtual scenarios and select context-appropriate approaches
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
